commits.msg:
Contrail plugin puppet manifests added

This commit contains the puppet code, files and templates
involved in plugin tasks.

Change-Id: Ib0569d8d99debdf0d3eaf37ae056a82fd1c07b41

Base network configuration and package installation

Base network configuration for compute and contrail controller and
package installation was implemented

Co-Authored-By: Oleksandr Martsyniuk (omartsyniuk@mirantis.com)
Change-Id: I417a0e3edd35ed6e2273fa558fd94a68c9f17a3f

Contrail controller nodes deployment stage 1

This commit contains puppet classes which create testbed file
for fabric tool and execute fab tasks on controller nodes.

Change-Id: Ie434d327ee53a5564adde001785b54a50eb30ebc
Co-Authored-By: Vyacheslav Struk (vstruk@mirantis.com)

Various small fixes

Change-Id: I05584c89b7bcdce8804366568ee4b93ad48049c4

Contrail controller nodes deployment stage 2

This commit contains puppet code which manages configuration files,
installs the opencontrail neutron plugin and restarts services.
Part of MOS controller configuration also implemented here.

Change-Id: Ibb9126d0e1493ae3c6d22bf7315c27656d1d8c43

Compute node configuration

Implements firewall, nova and contrail client configuration

Change-Id: Id71fe792b33808d1060a06f440941105bbc0dda8

Contrail provisioning

Implements contrail controller provisioning

Change-Id: I4d7c7cbf076f135948045f975b2aab7600c0a70d

Contrail vRouter provision

This commit contains puppet code which performs provisioning of
Contrail vRouter software running on openstack compute nodes.

Change-Id: I412515cff439100cb4bcf46b45b189623d87e16d

Installation script added

Installation script used to extract deb and rpm packages shipped
by Juniper as a  single package, place them to the plugin repository
and generate metadata files.

+Small fix of multi-controller deployment.
+LBaaS-related changes

Change-Id: I0fcc2e95bd344848094409d1caa2a9fc9b155a9c

Neutron URL fixed

A small fix for config puppet class, which resolves the neutron url issue.

Change-Id: I2a391f258825cd449f25cfe9a14031e399979b6d

Codestyle fixes, Ubuntu 14.04 and Contrail 2.01 adaptation,
various fixes

- Ruby functions returns string type now
- Codestyle fixes (puppet-lint)
- Fixes to work on Ubuntu 14.04
- Now plugin uses MOS controller's RabbitMQ instance
- Contrail 2.01 adaptation

Change-Id: I14005af2c4a2eca3a89b6e55d5b92c47f7b8d36c

Centos support implemented

Allows to use Contrail plugin in Centos-based environments

Change-Id: I07228bf1abcb7990943905b556fa06b02d72f85a

Adaptation to the latest fuel version

Adaptation to the latest fuel changes
Refactoring

Change-Id: I2579a9bc001bbe62e5c74a6537b1fb830e4d2f1d

Fuel plugin SDK v2 support

Plugin moved to fuel plugin SDK v2 which is only version supported
in fuel 6.1

Change-Id: I19563def65a313eeabca87b5e74842da79c54596

Typo fixes

Actual role is 'primary-controller' not 'primary_controller'.
Actual default AS number for contrail is 64512.
The default range for contrail private network changed.
Services list for Centos OpenStack controller clarified.

Change-Id: I63312afee18b7de19cab8e2ffada48ad3d1cd0f8

Support for Ubuntu 14.04 kernel 48-generic

Contrail-vrouter-dkms package added to support new Ubuntu kernels,
more recent than 35-generic.
Bugfix: contrail vrouter provision script arguments fixed.

Change-Id: I36efab2c04978cf22c9ea0ed0920cdb061e8613d

Deprecated code removed

According to the latest changes in fuel 6.1 we don't need this code
anymore. It was a part of our backlog.
Minor refactoring.

Closes-bug: 1440124

Change-Id: Ifa6180005b1aa58de1625a0b29238f6ceabd552e

Network-related changes

Network settings for contrail controllers updated.
Contrail controllers default route changed to public network gateway.
Metadata shared secret support added to contrail vrouter config.

Change-Id: I2311509f051b95bdfb657d27fd53261e625c4810

Firewall rule src-addr fix

There was a wrong src ip at firewall rule which allows metadata traffic

Change-Id: I94a0dec604d52dfc5f2c73223f30154812d22413

Plugin compartibility fixes

Manifests and templates updated to ensure plugin tasks
are run only on nodes named 'contrail-%'

Change-Id: I67a6c3668b5bec0c8efbe430828aec2ed8d5cf18

CentOS-related fixed

Several fixes to correct CentOS deployment process.

Change-Id: Ib2430c254b0fd5bff0ffe694f627fcea2d1f8173

Switch contrail to HA rabbitmq IP

Rabbitmq is using high availability virtual ip address now

Change-Id: I8056cef213e4352e04f85c6b3733413916379fed

Graceful reload for haproxy added.

In some cases trivial restart of haproxy service on controller nodes
returns an error. Puppet behaviour for service haproxy
changed from restart to reload.

Change-Id: I35091b8a46ebea293060bc11243028ca5bde4ce5

Centos-related bugfixes

- Patching and building vrouter module
- Service dependency fixes
- Bunch of centos-specific network changes
- Repository priority fixes

Change-Id: I3dffbbd683590e84a0fdc9d2803b0525150fe0d8

Mirantis copyright and license headers added

Change-Id: I542a432b4f5ca93b27bd2368189c1bc5ba013151

Node roles for plugin tasks updated.

Node_role variable for plugin puppet tasks set explicitly
to address the case when nodes may have multiple roles assigned,
e.g. compute nodes with ceph-osd.

Change-Id: I1e42f0f57c52a5ad1821eb252edbfc28c4507774

vRouter module build fix for latest Fuel builds.

Dependency on kernel-devel package added, the dkms routines
updated with additional checks.
Closes bug FPL-209.

Change-Id: Iade81a8d31ceda297ea560df001f62b99e0c3cc9

Private network configuration fixed for Centos

This commit addresses the issue with file for persistent
configuration of private network interface.

Change-Id: I8c9aecaad569a6ee3492106c29f385658fe0e612

OpenVSwitch removal routines updated

This commit is addressing the new openvswitch-dkms and openvswitch-kmod packages in
newer Fuel ISOs.

Change-Id: I52a8ce442b5e00f8eb1cc6c2f3362bbd50bf5635

Change addressing FPL-201

The public network removed from Contrail Controllers.
Contrail UI and API now available via haproxy on MOS Controllers.
Plugin UI updated.

Change-Id: I03a05f4597635a87a7133ec4aa61bd28b2971b38

Change addressing the bug FPL-219

To prevent de-configuring contrail private network interfaces
with netconfig routines when cluster nodes are added or removed,
plugin overrides the network scheme for compute nodes.
Contrail setup, configure and provisioning tasks ensured to be
idempotent to allow safe cluster configuration changes.

Change-Id: Ibb6dabafebc595b2182c1b44df93556710844e7d

Fixes removing a bunch of dependent packages

Some packages depends on each other and deploy fails on their remove
in some cases.
Fixed now.

Change-Id: Iffe2d955fc0f054ffbea7b1e79a6bb67ce45b956

Puppet template for hiera overrides updated

To prevent de-configuring contrail private network interfaces
plugin overrides the network scheme for compute nodes.
This commit updates the network_scheme overrides to ensure
compartibility with netconfig routines.

Change-Id: Iebd36b9349e9de87cf9d89feda4a93c9ca3e06ac

Fixes for updated contrail packages.

Contrail 2.01-46 release includes vrouter module patches.
We should get rid of code applying them.
Also debug output for fabric tasks enabled.

Change-Id: I7ff0fe346cd43f6311818cb5c3a8effaa32b2acd

Fabric tasks at contrail::setup are running package installation on REMOTE nodes

Such behaviour causes race conditions: local-started vs
remote-started package manager instances.

So contrail::setup moved to isolated post-deploy task.

Change-Id: I836ce3dbab9f1d5e040c2401c180bc0f824e2ca1
Closes-Bug: #1461611

Change addressing FPL-219

Admin_token and service_token variables clarified.
Now contrail uses keystone neutron settings from astute.yaml.

Change-Id: I5043d81a64e9eba6b2520547b8619598daab01ab

Package conflict resolved

python-pycrypto(contrail) and python-crypto(mos)

Change-Id: I32ce885d9a7060d92834c7431fad98f4d3c1d862

Patchset enables plugin deploy with latest contrail version

Set of changes to make plugin work with the latest contrail:

- Contrail SVC monitor added
- Casssandra minimal disk usage changed
- Patching commandline.py to change provisioning ip addresses

Change-Id: Ic82db390f26e40ff49b97dd429b76d94c2b67261

This commit reflects package-related changes in latest contrail

- MOS repo removed from contrail controllers
- pinning added for specific packages
- pip package versions updated

Change-Id: Idb7d027ad378f48f6516c9d0aea3d18441a0b712

FPL-219 related changes reverted

Now service_token variable is set to admin_token value.

Change-Id: Ia2e1fd1373a35002468281ba3d62a69e974b3185

Typos fixed, apt-repo related changes

- apt pinning and repo management moved from common-pre task

Change-Id: Ia5f79f076dbbfa7abdbccb5de0913dcffcec0849

Bugfixing for latest contrail

- typos fixed
- cassandra-related changes applied for all nodes
- pip packages list updated

Change-Id: I2b0fe1fab7783e027c5c8443dcf0e4b062a65c9e

Neutron admin password updated

- now neutron admin_password value is set from admin_token

Change-Id: I5237c2305094511eefb56ba09f5d170ec5e7b845

Change addressing FPL-219

Admin_token and service_token variables clarified.
Now contrail uses keystone neutron settings from astute.yaml.

Change-Id: I5043d81a64e9eba6b2520547b8619598daab01ab

Change addressing FPL-219

Admin_token and service_token variables clarified.
Now contrail uses keystone neutron settings from astute.yaml.

Change-Id: I5043d81a64e9eba6b2520547b8619598daab01ab

GRE segmentation mode support

Patch allows to deploy fuel environments with GRE segmentation mode.

Change-Id: Ia97d79787e5bbafdb1d23dc8c210fe59f03e418d

GRE segmentation mode support

Patch allows to deploy fuel environments with GRE segmentation mode.

Change-Id: I8447a6ef4c73e40c439e6123b8f51b1b694d0050

Network scheme overrides updated

Physical device names added, done some refactoring.

Change-Id: Ice40a6d43827d59c16e8bd1177b4c59da317acd4

Network scheme overrides updated

Physical device names added, done some refactoring.

Change-Id: Ice40a6d43827d59c16e8bd1177b4c59da317acd4

Puppet exec resource idempotency

The puppet exec resources updated to create a marker file on their
successful completion to avoid re-running the commands that can
potentially be unsafe or expected to fail on re-run.

Change-Id: I69dbc49da2d592eaad8d49bad606e4ce5d76a88d

Changes addressing latest Fuel ISOs

- role name updated for public interfaces
- explicit nova services restart added for controller nodes

Change-Id: Ib8ca8dc18ed482fb27007b35f420bb4b3435d0bd

Changes addressing latest Fuel ISOs

- role name updated for public interfaces
- explicit nova services restart added for controller nodes

Change-Id: Ib8ca8dc18ed482fb27007b35f420bb4b3435d0bd

Puppet exec resource idempotency

The puppet exec resources updated to create a marker file on their
successful completion to avoid re-running the commands that can
potentially be unsafe or expected to fail on re-run.

Change-Id: I69dbc49da2d592eaad8d49bad606e4ce5d76a88d

Haproxy service for contrail controllers ensured

Haproxy service must be restarted and running after changing
its configuration.

Change-Id: I2d95e44144f97c9eae7044fa401fa6c319cf78f3

Configuration file for nodemgr added

A separate nodemgr config file was added for deployment on compute nodes.

Change-Id: Ie5666425a970d1ce922fc5b090778006de1a9ca4

Commit addressing FPL-285

- hiera plugin overrides updated
- nova-compute ensured to be enabled on compute nodes
- private interface name pulled directly from astute.yaml
- bridge settings removed from private interface config

Change-Id: Ie8317c41f5dd23b37aff177aa863d1ee8b0467be

Contrail SVC Monitor configuration adjusted

The name of default section for rabbit settings in
contrail-svc-monitor.conf updated

Change-Id: I370f1ccd20b936d3491f1ce8654908e32033f725

Patch for keepalived config re-introduced

This commit addresses the incorrect keepalived configuration issue,
now fab creates a config file with correct devices described.

Change-Id: I7b1b66a0403893559ad7748537acfb6797dcf78f

Testbed file definitions updated

OpenStack admin password variable clarified to deploy the environment
with non-default credentials.

Change-Id: I1c5baa2c634a2528c02ef7ba9f40c26a6e50d2ea

Testbed file definitions updated

OpenStack admin password variable clarified to deploy the environment
with non-default credentials.

Change-Id: I1c5baa2c634a2528c02ef7ba9f40c26a6e50d2ea

Support for Private network gateway added

This commit introduces the ability to add a gateway for
private network into vRouters and contrail controllers
configuration. This gateway is needed to reach the
BGP peers in case if they are located outside Private network.

Change-Id: I1e88547cb2352d044a7be38229ac11467ef29c1e

A workaround that allows to complete re-deploy

Network configuration substituted by noop manifest.

Change-Id: I2cf35bc5018f1985b527eb36053c013041b58065

Disk space requirment for Cassandra updated

Testbed template updated with minimum disk space variable
set to 32 GB.

Change-Id: If1abc4ee832577e0dbb05e455868309f9fcce21d

A workaround that allows to complete re-deploy

Network configuration substituted by noop manifest.

Change-Id: I2cf35bc5018f1985b527eb36053c013041b58065

Patch for keepalived config re-introduced

This commit addresses the incorrect keepalived configuration issue.
Fabric creates a correct config file now.

Change-Id: Id4aefa302d8b32522216832746d1ea561bfe5712

Codestyle fix

Fix to pass puppet-lint

Change-Id: Ic500204668bf38003cf0c3b24a0fbb9e179e43d4

RabbitMQ settings updated for contrail-device-manager

Now contrail-device-manager service uses RabbitMQ on MOS controllers.

Change-Id: I3bba28adcaf9a153cec386d9d321e654ae63522d

Contrail Heat templates added

This commit introduses support for contrail-specific heat templates.

Change-Id: I7463b3895c63fb2c01a077c036bd682be281ccb7

Puppet template for hiera overrides updated

This commit updates the settings to be overrided in plugins hiera data file
to ensure idempotency of fuel-library routines in plugin-enabled environments.

Change-Id: Ifd86213faee9bfcc71528f9e891ecfa0a579afe2

Package priorities updated

- mos repo re-enabled on base-os nodes
- apt pinning file updated

Change-Id: I735e4f4a7c508a8e9f216a3ef075b637c68fe8a6

Typo fixed

A typo in puppet manifest eliminated

Change-Id: Ic0674e142acdf0ff7f24d62958f94b60fe298c31

Package pinning updated

APT pin file updated for compute nodes

Change-Id: I4a91b9fa10c3def141538a68fc95099ad317a459

Node re-deploy issue mitigated

- netconfig routines disabled on re-deploy
- plugin overrides removed
- condition for compute reboot added

Change-Id: Iea6b391dff83be2b16053b185a2af86d3a1b1215

GRE segmentation type support extended

Improvements:
- private IP address assignments from Fuel's neutron/mesh network
- additional static routes handling

Change-Id: I40997b3f0086c96678c3fb550a42c154de4f3dbc

Contrail database puppet manifest added

This commit contains puppet code, files and templates
to deploy the software packages and configuration
for contrail database component.

Change-Id: I45661087e0b0572930a3de68ff0ea722dde6172d

Contrail HA puppet manifest added

This commit contains puppet code, files and templates
to deploy the software packages and configuration
for keepalived and haproxy for contrail HA.

Change-Id: If4c48ba142607a9ed4221d286c6ef4799fbaadf1

Puppet cfgm class added for managing contrail-config service

This commit contains puppet code, files and templates
to deploy the software packages and configuration
for contrail config service.

Change-Id: Ic43aa9cdd7a4ba021c5c004e5fd851bdfce364a2

Puppet analytics class added

This commit contains puppet code, files and templates
to deploy the software packages and configuration
for contrail analytics service.

Change-Id: I72f0b3b52c50d8772f339ec2f3af80099872a608

Puppet control class added

This commit contains puppet code, files and templates
to deploy the software packages and configuration
for contrail control service.

Change-Id: I9c850ae56b9202ac4b990c93b30228a37ec7d4c0

Puppet webui class added

This commit contains puppet code, files and templates
to deploy the software packages and configuration
for contrail webui service.

Change-Id: I5b4d5c06af9178d0fb4303e90f01b865c1294ed8

Puppet provisioning class updated

This commit contains puppet code to provision the
services and configuration for contrail cluster.

Change-Id: I11b31ff70209110b7d6e77d83b42609d353f1b61

Contrail-specific heat templates settings added

Change-Id: Id98df8951940e84a5d856fa531ebc849d59a385b

Puppet neutron class added

This commit contains puppet code, files and templates
to deploy the contrail neutron plugin packages and configuration
for neutron service on openstack controller nodes.

Change-Id: Ia67f1022b927f34cc5a085b990fc6edd9a20fd9d

Contrail configuration updated

- cassandra listen address fixed
- forwarders list for contrail DNS added
- contrail VNC API config file added
- contrail config nodemgr file added
- provision routines updated
- config files permissions fixed

Change-Id: I79a7a30f8f01d0c2e25122e70536abd9b4f8ca15

Plugin version bump. UI support for OpenContrail added.

Change-Id: I466fd6f1299d4bbf2f6d2b322e8d3401da3c6024

Fix for contrail packages installation

Now the tzdata and tzdata-java packages versions are ensured to
contrail-specific.

Change-Id: I919be67695701540c845f7c453865bdb64126943

Opencontrail-related changes to configs and provisioning

- listen ports for Opencontrail services clarified
- provisioning routines updated

Change-Id: I5fc9488fd4d4f474b2f833139bb91c987b16d975

Provision routines changes for opencontrail reverted

Change-Id: I5f5cdc855addf3104eb4abdaceea65d30c00f8ef

Network puppet class updated

In some cases setting gateway for private network could
break the deployment.

Closes-bug: 1486078
Change-Id: Id2549539e9f52cdff37a7994601daca02789c1b9

Contrail VIP addresses updated

In environments with multiple node groups the variables values for
contrail VIPs could be resolved to addresses from wrong network segment.

Change-Id: I72b67fab047faffce816107f3263d57f2c45d552
Closes-bug: 1490685

Vrouter fixup added for compute nodes

Puppet manifests for compute nodes updated to install
a fixup-vrouter init script and start it at boot to
workaroung bug 1494638.
Plugin repo priority adjusted.
Netconfig task moved to separate puppet task, in some cases
a shell task configuring network could cause timeouts.

Closes-bug: #1495538
Closes-bug: #1493023
Change-Id: Iab09e925f9767d19d8d3f20e82587ddae39c0ecc

Performance tuning for contrail-config services

Supervisord files updated to raise the limit of open files.

Change-Id: Ie1e38f3d96732c59ae46724b8b2f8acb3f21a7c0

Provides support for more recent Contrail builds

Change-Id: I64f08c0079e3de1a4868b5507770d9d101f3e7c6
Signed-off-by: Illia Polliul <ipolliul@mirantis.com>

Transfer Contrail logs via syslog

Add cron job for transfer contrail-logs to Fuel
master via syslog.

Change-Id: I2ee93e11a5fed5b90af12e8bc3b66076d60cfab9
Closes-Bug: #1499314

Plugin updated to support Fuel 7.0

- metadata updated with SDK version and supported releases
- plugin version bump
- pre_build hook updated
- plugin manifests updated to support latest contrail builds

Change-Id: Ibfa5e980c63588671446fba910f340cd40786ab4

Adding Fuel default virtual networks

The plugin manisfests updated to create net04 and net04_ext
networks after deployment of neutron contrail plugin.
Route target is configured for net04_ext.
This allows the environment to pass OSTF tests out of the box.

Change-Id: I18862dee25656a3b56ef20b45c3dd286508d4f58

GW for Private network removed from plugin settings

Default environment settings expect BGP peers to be
in the Private cluster network.
In case of using multiple cluster networks,
Fuel Node groups feature must be used.
Plugin puppet code updated to use gateway for Private
network set via Fuel network settings.

Change-Id: Icaf016dc6f8c3f64b97aa3249d06a2987940279b

Config file for heat engine updated

Plugins_dir variable updated, services provider changed to pacemaker.

Change-Id: I3e9481523b4b2856546aec4f9bb969bb994c401f

Package install routines updated

Plugin manifests updated to remove the hardcoded
version of tzdata-java.

Change-Id: I2c950aa3ecab8c691614beb9d6c9c26793b7f399

Deployment tasks updated to support plugin roles.

Roles for contrail-db, contrail-config and contrail-control added.
Plugin tasks refactored to support new roles.
Templates for config files updated.

Change-Id: I236085c86dc18fe53f6a1d59dbcfafb170d64c18

Custom VIP functions added

Now plugin defines a custom VIP in private network,
hosted on openstack controller nodes and managed by Fuel HA.
This VIP is used as a load-balancer for contrail services.

Change-Id: I22044860dbea52c73a9a090ed27b5c5318bab7b2

Plugin tasks for compute nodes updated

Network and vRouter-related code refactored.

Change-Id: I5c56edd43c12e9a816088a03510984b9fc483e17

Plugin tasks updated

Contrail repo priorities adjusted.
Zookeeper config template updated.
Hiera override for OSTF nets template updated.

Change-Id: Iace1dac1ad785de6fdc7fbbe11d340c63bcc2cf5

APT pin for computes updated

Now the plugin pre-deploy tasks set the proper
package repo priorities on compute nodes, that ensures
nova-compute and qemu/kvm packages installed from
mos repos.
Node provision routines now run on all of
the contrail-control nodes.

Change-Id: Iae2596bf0f4577252c52339c691078b10697b654

Compute pre-deploy task updated

Change-Id: Id4bfa3e37a3bca95359460eccd16194275143e08

Quick fix for control class

VNC API config added for control nodes.
IF-MAP users file updated.
Exec resource defaults deined.

Change-Id: I7729ec214d3dcec80e41ad673505e5723ee0440a

Contrail vRouter provision changes

Provision routines for compute nodes updated to use VIP in Private network
and to run before OVS removal.

Change-Id: Ib2041730d53fd9502f5d45ad97d954ce07a681f6
Closes-bug: #1517973

Get_private_ifname function updated

Now an argument with private bridge name can be specified,
that allows to use bridges with custom names.

Change-Id: I1dd36e349e9302b9913a719d82f1c3efa22603da

Provision routines for computes updated

Now provision command is not re-executed on
re-running the plugin manifests.

Change-Id: Ief2e0c0855a610fe8f990c57d34106d2810efc76

Plugin-defined volume for contrail-db added

- custom location for cassandra data files introduced
- cassandra config templates updated
- volumes.yaml file added

Change-Id: I1c9933c614fe88f444232a7e8bc8a69d2a6df83b

Update to vrouter provision

- now the vrouter provision routine use the binary from
contrail-utils package

Change-Id: I179b56053627d152ae3c77ce25f8d1f70c730a36

Unused services disabled

- puppet manifests updated to disable the neutron agents on controllers,
which are not used with contrail

Change-Id: Ib67f2d38d7126aa21e0fbf9a92df92de9754311b

Special chars screened in provision routines

Admin and service users can contain special characters, so the puppet manifests
for contrail and compute nodes provisioning were updated to screen them.

Change-Id: I3b18cf33a4934dd12d6dc6fb2ee8011a5bd7cc05

Routines for disabling unused services updated

Disabled pacemaker services can affect adding new ones.
Now PCS resources for disabled services are deleted.

Change-Id: I90254602ac531368446ea260cdafa619b2c82148
Closes-bug: #1527628

Contrail syslog script updated

- analytics_api_ip argument added to contrail-logs command
- cron job now is executed on primary config node only

Change-Id: I0aa8f32dde2acfd86ab4bd4d1b436c2356f69591

Contrail distribution removed from plugin settings

- environment_config updated

Change-Id: I9b28da1061224f5150b3aa6faeedcb88f0946e10

Compute puppet manifests updated

- nova-compute service refreshed
- compute node reboots avoided

Change-Id: I0498a504721fb06121b6e070b1de0c91d5a19b6d

Fix for case when cinder is on controller node

Change-Id: I871ded17a6e50c4400a188c2a4611a686f4dc582
Signed-off-by: Vitalii Kovalchuk <naviot96@gmail.com>

Rewrite haproxy configs using native openstack::ha::haproxy_service resource

Change-Id: Ib47f07149ae7bb1481f77791925894432ae6d5c9

Add ssl to contrail public API endpoints

Change-Id: Iccd2c7edcdf756f1edf99db7e83f249fb0e9afac

Support for Contrail-specific Ceilometer meters

Change-Id: Ia3919fc7526c4b1ab9e3a20347c1fc30b8ba02eb

Implement shared certificate for Contrail WebUI

Change-Id: I1918dd1c0bdc6f04f91aa2ccced9f6ef87847fc9

Add Kafka deployment integration

Change-Id: I0bd1e633eb2eddcdce95b2093b04a2662f78c5dd

Conditional service startup for contrail components

To support upgrades, we need a way to control of services
start-up after components deployment. If a flag variable is found
in Hiera, manifests do not ensure services to be started.

automation service starts and restarts after package installation
or upgrades

Override network_scheme to skip interfaces used by DPDK vrouter

  * Depends on new l23network features
  * Overrides br-mesh to vhost0
  * vhost0 pre-up line has to be moved from interfaces.d file
  * Gateway is set if multirack configuration is used
  * Supervisor config is generated in the same way as in virouter init
    script. This prevents unnecessary restarts during task execution
  * Private interface mac is generated by facter instead of a function
  * openstack-network-common-config is skipped for the dpdk role

(cherry picked from commit 70838b35dccc0b599478c0e3e081074c3a4377b3)

Actualize package names for service_overrides

Current names for tweaks::ubuntu_service_override don't match packages which
will be installed. That leads to those packages being installed before
tweaks::ubuntu_service_override.

Add set of additinal ubuntu_service_overrides

Also, default `require` for file resource is deleted to prevent
depenency cycles.

Change-Id: I5c34542009c75a9e7a17e465bb79e7f86db2d77f

Stop configuring contrail-named from a template

Currently contrail-named is configurated from a template, which doesn't make any
sence 'cause contrail-dns overrides contrail-named's configuration files.

Change-Id: If91b98fa2c835cf764f4a66b777b4ec8e7664c30

Wait until all tables for anaylytics are ready

During starting up contrail-collector creates all tables in Cassandra.
This process shouldn't  take place on all contrail-analytics nodes
simultaneously, because it may break Cassandra DB.

To prevent concurrent tables creating, wait_for_cassandra_keyspace is added.
